description: A Quobyte mount that lasts the lifetime of a pod. Quobyte volumes do not support ownership management or SELinux relabeling.

group.description: Group to map volume access to. Default is no group

readOnly.description: Force the Quobyte volume to be mounted with read-only permissions.

registry.description: A single or multiple Quobyte registry services which act as the central registries for volumes, specified as a string as '`host:port`' pair (multiple entries are separated with commas).

user.description: User to map volume access to. Defaults to serivceaccount user

volume.description: A string that references the name of an existing Quobyte volume.
